Description:
Whether to enable this feature or not.

Note that this feature is still in beta. Once it gets out of the beta stage, it will be always enabled.

*This is a boolean value.*

If this option is enabled, Gurutracker will automatically save the notes file on every keystroke.

This might consume a lot of resources, hence it is recomended to keep this disabled. 

*This is a boolean value.*
The location of the text file where the notes are stored.
